description:
Tree pruning to TPO trees

Tree Preservation Application At:

Angel Centre, 1-3 Pentonville Road, Islington, London, N1 9HJ

TPO Reference:

T5 – Caucasian Wingnut of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007 (Applicants ref *T2)
T6 – Caucasian Wingnut of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007 (Applicants ref *T3)
T20 – Caucasian Wingnut of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007 (Applicants ref *T14)
T25 – Caucasian Wingnut of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007 (Applicants ref *T15)
T27 – Caucasian Wingnut of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007 (Applicants ref *T16)

PO Number:

T100364

Work specifications:

2 x Wingnut (T5 and T6) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Crown lift by 3.5 m over pavement and lift to 6 m over highway.
1 x Wingnut (T20) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Cut back branches from the emergency stairs to give a 1 m clearance
2 x Wingnut (T25 and T27) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Reduce 4-5 lowest branches back to boundary of neighbours fence line and deadwood.(37 Mydleton Road)

Decision:

Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: The agent has been contacted as it has been decided that only 5 of the 15 trees that where applied for are going to be reduced.
